div.p: H75/8783, unit 814, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the Quarter ending October 31st. 1875.

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.5pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: 0.5pt solid #000000; border-bottom: 0.5pt solid #000000;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

cell.p:
Estimate* of Expenditure for 2 months
Quarter crossed out.

cell.p: Total— One hundred and eighty three pounds thirteen shillings and four pence
